title: Riot, seriously, we want an answer: Are we going to be compensated for all the losses give out? When
body: I am starting my promos off 0/1, is it safe to try to win my next 2 promos or should I wait to get that game back

replies.body:
There were some high impacting server issues yesterday for a lot of players, and we put up some messaging on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Your best bet is to bookmark that site should any issues arise, and plan your next matches accordingly.  To be safe, I don't suggest hopping into a ranked while an issue is being investigated just to be safe.  

In regards to the title of your post, it's truthfully not something I have visibility towards.  It's a crappy case for players who were impacted with a loss due to the server problems, but literally have no means to adjust game stats.  I can definitely relay your feedback and sentiments, but these things aren't my call to make.  Should anything come up, though, I'll do my best to offer an update.
